page.title: 17HOME LIFE KING'S NYMPTON
page.content: The family unit is still strong within this area.Some of the farming families have been here for several generations and a high proportion are linked by marriage.Because there is no easy way of travelling to local towns the children stay within their own family group in their primary years and until they are old enough to ride a motor vehicle they depend on their parents' goodwill in driving them to clubs, discos etc.Very few homes are without television ,some also having video recorders. Some families have a computer.Labour saving machines are in general use, cleaners, washing machines, dishwashers,food mixers and deep freezes. Cats and dogs are the most popular pets.When land is available ponies and horses may be kept for hacking or hunting
